entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 3:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
